meanings.sent1: My cullies and I always play together at the park.
meanings.sent2: She is my best cullie; we do everything together.
meanings.sent3: My cullies make me laugh with their silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the main character's loyal dog was his cullie.
meanings.sent5: I consider my pet cat as my furry cullie.

meanings.definition: To gather or select from a group.
meanings.sent1: I will cullies the ripe apples from the tree for our pie.
meanings.sent2: The farmer cullies the best vegetables for the market.
meanings.sent3: She cullies the prettiest flowers for her bouquet.
meanings.sent4: The detective cullies evidence to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: He carefully cullies the right tools for his woodworking project.

meanings.definition: To treat as a close friend or companion.
meanings.sent1: She cullies her new classmates with kindness.
meanings.sent2: He cullies his rescue dog like a family member.
meanings.sent3: The chef cullies his favorite ingredients for a special dish.
meanings.sent4: The teacher cullies all students equally in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The explorer cullies his trusted map on every adventure.
